publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7109.3 Claire Baker: Higher Educationâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-7109) in the name of Elizabeth Smith, leave out from "welcomes" to first "education" and insert "acknowledges the growing consensus among key groups within and outwith the university sector that recognises the need to examine the various graduate contribution options; calls for an urgent and independent review of institutional funding and student support".
